title: Computer-Mediated Communication-Based Reflective Culture Comparison Education for EFL Learning Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher English communication proficiency and basic digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based, limited-technology environments, emphasizing asynchronous learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can deliver English oral presentations of over five minutes incorporating cultural differences
Learners can enhance communication skills with native speakers by over 40% through twice-weekly smartphone-based video conferences
Learners provide analysis reflecting critical thinking on over 70% of observation items when writing reflective essays
Learners generate over ten English sentences explaining the historical significance of cultural symbols (holidays, festivals, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
